description: Registers a cluster or serverless namespace to the Amazon Web Services Glue Data Catalog.

parameters.name: NamespaceIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the cluster or serverless namespace that you want to register. ServerlessIdentifier (dict) --- The identifier for a serverless namespace. The unique identifier for the serverless namespace. The unique identifier for the workgroup associated with the serverless namespace. ProvisionedIdentifier (dict) --- The identifier for a provisioned cluster. The unique identifier for the provisioned cluster.

nested_params.name: ServerlessIdentifier
nested_params.description: The identifier for a serverless namespace.

nested_params.name: NamespaceIdentifier
nested_params.description: The unique identifier for the serverless namespace.

nested_params.name: WorkgroupIdentifier
nested_params.description: The unique identifier for the workgroup associated with the serverless namespace.

nested_params.name: ProvisionedIdentifier
nested_params.description: The identifier for a provisioned cluster.

nested_params.name: ClusterIdentifier
nested_params.description: The unique identifier for the provisioned cluster.

parameters.name: ConsumerIdentifiers
parameters.description: An array containing the ID of the consumer account that you want to register the namespace to. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The registration status of the cluster or serverless namespace.
